title: Subchapter A - Service
content:
Subchapter A - Service

State Regulations

Part 90 - Consumer Deposits-electric Corporations (§ 90.1 to 90.10)

Part 91 - Consumer Deposits-municipal Utilities (§ 91.1 to 91.4)

Part 92 - Meters-testing And Reporting (§ 92.1 to 92.27)

Part 93 - Approval Of New Types Of Electricity Meters, Instrument Transformers And Auxiliary Devices (§ 93.0 to 93.133 to 93.136)

Part 94 - Use By Electric Corporation Of Demand Meters And Registers Of The Indicating Type (§ 94.1 to 94.3)

Part 95 - Repealed

Part 96 - Residential Electric Submetering (§ 96.1 to 96.9)

Part 97 - Notice Of Interruptions Of Service (§ 97.1 to 97.5)

Part 98 - General Provisions Relating To The Extension Of Facilities By Electric Corporations And Municipalities (§ 98.1 to 98.7)

Part 99 - New Construction Of Distribution Lines, Service Lines, And Appurtenant Facilities In Certain Visually Significant Resources Outside Residential Subdivisions (§ 99.1 to 99.2)

Part 100 - New Construction Of Distribution Lines, Service Lines And Appurtenant Facilities In Residential Subdivisions (§ 100.1 to 100.10 to 100.11)

Part 101 - Underground Electric Facility Construction (§ 101.1 to 101.4)

Part 102 - Installation Of Non-article Vii Electric Transmission Facilities (§ 102.1 to 102.6)

Part 105 - Electric Utility Emergency Plans (§ 105.1 to 105.6)

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. Part 90 - Consumer Deposits-electric Corporations (§ 90.1 to 90.10)
